custom-action.name: latency
custom-action.description:
Run a Choas Monkey engineering scenario defined in Gremlin.
Possible parameters are: - GremlinToken (required): Gremlin API Token Default value is "Gremlin API Token". - GremlinTeamID (required): Gremlin Team ID Default value is "Gremlin Team ID". - GremlinTargetType (required): Type of target : hosts or containers Default value is "Type of target : hosts or containers". - GremlinTargetHostTags (required): List of tags seperated by a , Default value is "List of tags to select the host that will be target by the attack". - GremlinTarget (required): Select the target by Percent or exact Default value is "percent or exact". - GremlinTargetNumber (required): Number of targets that would be impacted ( in percentage or exact depends on the value the parameter GremlinTarget Default value is "Number of targets that would be impacted ". Adds latency to all matching egress network traffic https://www.gremlin.com/docs/infrastructure-layer/attacks/latency
Possible parameters are: - Length (optional): The length of the attack (seconds) Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "60". - MS (optional): How long to delay egress packets (millis) Value must be of type: Integer Default value is "100". - IP Addresses (optional): Only impact traffic to these IP addresses Exclude a host from impact with a leading '^' Value must be of type: IP - Device (optional): Impact traffic over this network interface Defaults to the first device it finds (Ex: `eth0`) Value must be of type: String - Hostnames (optional): Only impact traffic to these hostnames Exclude a host from impact with a leading '^' Value must be of type: URL Default value is "^api.gremlin.com". - Remote Ports (optional): Only impact outgoing traffic to these remote ports Ranges work too: '8080-8085' Value must be of type: String Default value is "^53". - Local Ports (optional): Only impact outgoing traffic from these local ports Ranges work too: '8080-8085' Value must be of type: String

custom-action-parameter.value: Type of target : hosts or containers
